title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Chargers/Chiefs TNF Reaction + 'Sharp or Square' Week 2 NFL Picks
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Chargers/Chiefs TNF Reaction + 'Sharp or Square' Week 2 NFL Picks
description:
Colin reacts to the Chargers tough Thursday Night road loss to the Chiefs at Arrowhead, and what he sees as their glaring weakness through 2 weeks. (3:00)

Then the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 2 picks are "sharp" or "square". They look at Patriots/Steelers (9:00), Bucs/Saints (11:00), Commanders/Lions (17:00), Jets/Browns (19:00), Bengals/Cowboys (22:00),Vikings/Eagles, and Colts/Jags (28:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
